description:

Name: Sweeper
Category: EXTREM-256
Language: FastBasic 4.6
Machine: Atari 8bit XL/XE
Page: https://www.vitoco.cl/atari/10liner/SWEEPER/
Download: https://www.vitoco.cl/atari/10liner/SWEEPER/SWEEPER.ATR

Clean the floor with your broom.

Use the hints of surrounding tiles

to avoid mines.

Game written for NOMAM's

BASIC 10-liners Contest 2023.

Requires:

- Atari XL/XE (or emulator)

- FastBasic 4.6 IDE

- 1 Joystick

Game instructions:

- Select the size of the board

  using the joystick and press

  action button to start the game.

- Use the joystick to move the

  pointer over the board.

- Press the action button to

  reveal the content of a selected

  tile.

- Long-press the button to change

  the action by moving the stick

  and release the button to apply.

- Hint numbers say how many mines

  are hidden in its 8 surrounding

  tiles.

- You can place a flag over tiles

  you think there is a mine by

  selecting the flag action.

- You can remove a flag using the

  tile action or by revealing its

  content with the broom action.

- You loose if you reveal a mine.

- You win if you reveal all tiles

  except the ones with mines.

- Use the timer to beat yourself.
